text: "Be Quick of Be Dead" is a 1992 song by English heavy metal band Iron Maiden and is the leading single from their 9th studio album Fear of the Dark. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom and Finland and went to the top ten in Norway, Ireland and Demark. It also reached number 12 in New Zealand. ==Track listings== 7-inch single 12-inch single UK 12-inch single CD single UK CD single French CD maxi-single == References == Category:1992 songs Category:Iron Maiden songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Be Quick or Be Dead
